attributes.action: Get all Supermarkets to organise Care Packages for the Elderly and Vulnerable
attributes.additional_details: Since the COVID-19 crisis many essential items we find in a large supermarket are out of stock and nothing on shelves, there have been many elderly people I have seen that have been unable to buy basic things such and toilet roll we need to change this and get supermarkets to arrange care packages for the vulnerable and elderly
attributes.background: I Want the big supermarkets to organise Care Packages for the Elderly and Vulnerable who will need essential items which currently are being brought up by greedy and selfish people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302940

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
